channel.title: Code and Stuff
channel.description: Recent content on Code and Stuff

item.title: Introducing Code and Stuff
item.author: ferdy89@gmail.com (Fernando Seror)
item.description: Hello! My name is Fernando and I code professionally. I have been into computers since I was very young and I’ve devoted a big part of my life to it. I currently work primarily with Ruby and one of the things I love the most about it is its community. I’ve learned a lot from watching conference talks and reading on the Internet, and most of that content was created by people in their free time.
